name: unary-js-monorepo
description: Only unary function, for the glory of FP in JS.

scripts.npmi:rm: rimraf clean && npm cache clean -f && npm cache verify
scripts.npmi:first: npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.npmi:reset: npm run npmi:unlock && npm run npmi:rm && npm run npmi:first
